name: False Dreams
description:
False Dreams I want to be Free

You are a Marionette who longs to be free of their strings. What they doesn’t realize is they are cutting away the very thing that’s holding them up. Some things may seem harmful to us but are there for our own good. The Marionette is able to control their body this whole time yet wanted to see what it would feel like not to have strings even though they had everything they wanted. 

In the game, the controls are unconventional:
  • W controls the leg further away
  • S controls the closer leg
  • D makes the Marionette bow/jump depending on where he’s facing and A does the opposite.
  • F is to flip the direction the Marionette is facing.

Have fun!
